Item.Review:
Pros: Cost is low, great quality, easy setup
This printer is really great. Its exactly what I was looking for. It's compact, light weight, and has excellent print quality for b & w or color documents and photos. Out of the box, it was so easy to set up and connect to my wireless network. I also love the HP E-print services. If you have the printer connected to the internet through your router, you can send a print job from your phone or mobile device or from work or from anywhere that you can send something to an email address. It's awesome. Snap a photo with your camera phone and send it to your printer from wherever you are. Forward an email to the address for your printer and it will print out for you and be waiting when you get home. This printer also makes color or b & ... w copies relatively fast and scans very well. You can not beat this printer for the money. It's awesome! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Very nice printer/scanner for home use.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up & use. Reasonable price. Small footprint.
If you are looking for a light weight multi-function printer for home use, this one is a good choice. I am using with a desktop PC ( windows XP Pro ) via USB connection and it was up & running within minutes of setting it up (which was pretty easy) I replaced a HP 2200 series all-in-one after the color cartridge spring-loaded "trap door" broke, after close to ten years of use. NOTE: If you are replacing a HP printer, I would suggest uninstalling associated HP software first ( using add/remove programs ) and then use the Set-up CD that comes with the 3050A.
I am guessing that the 3050A or 3052A would not be a good choice for business use. However, if you need to print, scan, copy for normal home use, and yo ... u don't want to spend a lot of money, this should work out really well. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Easy To Use
Cons: Jams Easily; Slow Operation; Flimsy Construction; Noisy
I bought this printer to replace an older HP Printer that I have had for years only because I wanted to have a wireless printer. What a mistake. Very flimsy construction and noisy. Is slow to print on the wireless option so connected via USB to my laptop for faster printing. It was easy to setup , but I immediately received a message that I had a recycled HP cartridge installed. I used the printer for approximately 1 month (light use) when it started to jam. The paper was not feeding properly. Bad roller. I did online troubleshooting, then called customer service. I then spent over an hour on customer service trouble shooting (very painful)for them to come to the sa ... me conclusion - ah bad roller. I needed a new printer. To make a really long story short, I was eventually shipped a reconditioned printer, that was BROKEN!!! I am now being overnighted another reconditioned printer, they promised to check it out before shipping again. I have now been without a printer for 10 days..very aggravated with customer service and very disappointed with the product quality. Spend the money and buy a better model!!! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I've used a number of printers over the years and my experience shows this printer to be typically average for printing regular pages but when it comes to printing photos it falls short. After only printing a few photos, the skin tones turned from slightly orange to deep orange with thin white lines running through the pictures. I've recalculated the printer numerous times yet that particular problem remains.
Previous to this printer, I used a photo printer (different mfgr) and that worked well but only lasted about 2 yrs afterwhich neither I nor customer service were able to resolve the printing issues which came from the defective print heads (that were attached to the ink cartridges instead of in the printer itself). Print heads on ink cartridges are easily damaged (either from m ... aufacturing, packaging or installation into the printer) versus print heads in the printer itself. I'd rather have the print head in the printer and pay more for the ink, than have a printer unable to print pictures because of faulty print heads on ink cartridges.
Again, this printer is good for printing documents etc, but its not good for printing pictures/photos. The ink is inexpensive in comparrison to other ink cartridges, but its almost a waste when the printer's best use is for documents that require mainly black ink, leaving the tri-colors to dry out for lack of use. These HP ink cartridges also have the print heads on them, like my previous printer (different manufacturer). So, that leaves me to wonder if my present print problem with this HP might, again, be the same problem I had with my previous printer.
I do love the wireless and eprint features which were easy to setup and execute. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Way Better than reviewers give it credit for
Item.Review: I was forced to make this purchase of this product because my old HP printer went completely belly-up. I really couldn't afford it so that is why I took the time to read every single one of the reviews on this product before I purchased - I did not want to get a lemon. The reviews were 60/40 against, but the product fit my price range. I have not had a single problem with this printer. The printout is wonderful even in draft mode. I've never had a paper jam except once and that was my fault for not having enough sheets in the paper tray. Setup was remarkably easy (although for beginners, the documentation left a lot to be desired). I noticed a lot of reviewers mentioned the printer door not staying closed, but so far that has not happened. But most of all, I love the fact that when I forge ... t, it turns itself off - love it, love it! And the ink usage and cost is soooo economical. Only negative aspect of this product I found was: I don't have it setup as a wireless, but from what I read in the instructions, I can see that would be a bit of pain if I were to do so. Overall, it is A GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Everything
Cons: Nothing
This printer was a breeze to set up. I'm running Windows XP on my desktop and did the initial installation with an USB connection. Simple and quick. I then wanted to set up the wireless connection but the directions were unclear whether I could have both USB and wireless connections. A quick call to Customer Service confirmed both connections, at the same time, were possible. I used my laptop (Windows 7) for that configuration and it was, again, extremely simple. It even took all the wireless router information from the laptop so I didn't even have to put in the passcode. Setting up the printer on both the Windows 7 and a Mac laptop was also simple. The print quality is excellent. I have not tried to print pictures, but I've printed colored docu ... ments, copied and scanned multiple documents into a single PDF. You can even email documents to this printer and it will print them out, including any attachments. This is a great printer for a bargain price. Very highly recommended. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Great All-In-One Printer For The Money
Item.Review:
Pros: Excellent value for the money
Cons: HP Replacement Ink is expensive
What can I say, When you get a HP your getting the best. Works perfectly each and every time. This printer was very easy to set up with the wireless, just follow the instruction from the install disk.. I use generic brand replacement ink and it still prints great..

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Ease of use
Cons: Front access panel sticks sometimes
Replaced a ten year old printer. Easy to set up, even for a newbie to wireless. Clear, simple directions right out of the box. One difference: it prints documents from the last page to the first instead of the other way around. I don't know if that is the printer or the set up in my program.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Cons: Noisy
This is a great printer. I use it for my home based business and would highly recommend it.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Cost
Cons: Difficult setup
I havent used it much... but can tell you setting up was no easy task. I have a Mac with Lion and it started working at first and then would not work properly. I had to connect the cable to the computer and after several attempts it got my network.
Installation CD does not work with new OS.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Just got this printer today. Followed the easy setup instructions, loaded the disk on my pc (which is next to the printer), followed the instructions on the disk. Loaded easily printing via my pc's wireless connection. My HP Touchpad was easy to setup and prints easily.. Also, setting up eprint was easy and it works. Highly recommend this to anyone who wants to print wirelessly or from their HP Touchpad or other brand tablet.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: For the price, this wireless printer is awesome! I used to have to keep going into the other room to hook my laptop up to my printer to print out things and it was a pain so I finally got new printer and it was definitely worth it. I love being able to stay on the couch and print something from my laptop. It's very quick and very easy to set up and use.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: My word, for the price this is the best little printer. I have had several HP printers in the past, and since my last one was quite old I decided to get a new one. I chose this one primarily because of good reviews by other customers, the price, and the free delivery. THE PRICE IS RIGHT. What a great little printer, it was super easy to install, and prints well, and the print quality is superb. HP stands at the head of the class for quality.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Crossing fingers it doesn't break down too
Item.Review:
I had the DJ3050. Although only used sparingly after 7 months it stopped working. Would not feed paper. HP support could not troubleshoot so after I wouldn't take no for an answer, since it was under warranty, they replaced it with the 3050A.
AFAICT the 3050A is exactly the same mechanically as the 3050. Only difference is the LCD screen and the eprint function, So I am keeping my fingers crossed that this one also doesn't just stop working. Since my warranty was not extended I will be out of luck.
I use it via USB and had to figure out how to get the blue wireless light to stop flashing, HP support didn't even know. I hope eventually when I do want to hook it up wirelessly that it works. Oh and while installing the bloatware...errr software CD I got an error. So who knows ho ... w that will manifest itself.
So far the printing on this one is underwhelming. Some smearing and parts of letters missing. Certainly can't use it for something important.
On a purely selfish note I liked the look of the 3050 better. It was all black and matched my HP Pavillion (bought at same time as DJ3050) desktop. This one is matte black with grey. Doesn't match at all. Kind of odd. Maybe it matches their current products. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent choice at very low cost
Item.Review: This printer was everything it was cracked up to be in the reviews I read before purchasing. It was very easy to set up on my wireless network, as it even set the codes automatically for me !!! Love it!! It works flawlessly with my hp laptop, and my ipad2. I have it in our family room in the lower level of a split level home an I can print from a bedroom 2 levels above with out any problems. The additional software tha hp has for download directly to the printer is another bonus. I can not say anything yet to how long the ink will lasts I have only had this for about 3 weeks now. I will update at a latter time as to the efficience of this essential aspect. As of now, Yes !! It is a very good wireless network printer at a great price. I will, and have recommended it to my friends.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: For an inexpensive printer, the performance is very good and I have no complaints on that score. Very easy to set up and use, however I am completely at a loss to understand how to change the print resolution. The machine will only print on a normal setting (which is very good) but draft and best are both 'greyed out', and nothing I have tried makes them usable. 'Custom' appears to be available, but then what ? Plenty of instructions on how to change settings, but that's no good if you can't change them when you get there. Pity, because it's a great printer and scanner, but I've deducted a star because of this. Very frustrating.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Just received and set up. Lightweight. Came with Carrier for portability. I am not tech savy and this was easy to setup. Directions were easy to follow. I chose to use the USB setup and not go wireless because I didn't see myself using the printing options that came along with the wireless setup. Tonight I only used the printer. The printed documents were clean, clear, no smudges. I am pleased with my printer choice and would recommend it.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: HP deskjet 350A all in one printer
Item.Review: Very pleased with the performance and the ease of setting this printer up. Comes with a case to have it portable and is very light weight. I would recommend this to anyone with home office needs.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: everything
Cons: Nothing that I'm aware of yet.
Easy to buy because of the low price, easy to set up, easy to use, easy to get attached to.......great machine.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Low cost, dependable.
Cons: Nothing, so far.
I use this as my "general purpose" printer. I print documents, checks, charts, etc. I have another printer for photos. I use the ePrint capability with my iPad. Printer is quick to respond, average in print speed, and seems to use expendables reasonably.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: be assured,this is a good product.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Quiet; Fast Operation; Compact Design; Reliable; Easy To Set Up; Great Print Quality
i feel this is a good product. anyone can use it and enjoy it without frustration.i recomend it for beginers and advanced users.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Fast printing, great price, easy setup
Cons: Nothing, especially considering the price
This printer works exactly as advertised. I had no problem installing it on both my Mac and a Linux PC. It also took absolutely no additional setup to AirPrint from my iPhone and iTouch. It also appears to wake up and print much more quickly than any other HP printer I've owned. The scanner works just fine wirelessly, no bugs and reasonably good quality. Given the inexpensive nature of the device, I was surprised by the quality and speed of the photocopy option.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: SImple product that does just what I needed it to do.
This printer works, is completely affordable, is rated Energy Star, is judicious with ink, and took 15 minutes to go from box to printing. The printing quality and speed is great for home/school/office work uses. Wi-fi set-up is easy and automated. ePrint feature I haven't used yet but it's a cool addition that is also easy to set up. I exchanged an Epson I bought with similar bells and whistles that cost about $50 more and stopped workng after a year. I've only had this one for a day but so far, it's been a much more reasonable commitment of time, space and resources for home printing than the Epson.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this printer for the wireless feature and the scan and copy capabilities. I have another manufacturer's printer, a very good one, but it lacks those features and its ink cartridges are expensive. So far I've been quite satisfied with its performance. Haven't tried printing photos on it, but I'm happy with the color reproduction I get on printed documents.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Compact Design; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Reliable
Cons: Slow Operation
For the money, this is a really great printer. Not as fancy as some, but it does what it needs to do for me, which is print and scan.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Just what I was looking for
Item.Review:
I wanted an economical Printer for home/ homework use. I have owned 4 other printers and so far this is my favorite.
I purchased this to replace a Lexmark all in one printer that I purchased last year. I was so frustrated with both the performance of that printer and the cost of the ink... if onecartridge was out of ink.... no printing at ALL. I was replacing an ink cartridge after each homework assignment.
So far I have had great performance and the ink is half the cost of my Lexmark... anyone need a boat ancor?
Also... the wireless WORKS, you just need to turn the power button on and whatever you sent to the printer will print out... I like the power saving performance.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Best Light Duty HP Deskjet Printer Ever Made
Item.Review:
I have been a Cannon Inkjet printer user for the last 10 years. For my light duty needs they performed fine until the last two purchases. The last two printers failed a couple of months after the warranty expired. That was the last straw with Cannon.
I have not looked into the line of HP DeskJet printers for more than a decade. I was very pleasantly surprised by the selection and prices. After reading as many reviews from every online source I could fine, it appeared that the recently discontinued HP DeskJet 3050 had good reviews and the new HP DeskJet 3050A model was starting to get good reviews also. After using my new printer for a while, I love it.
I was a little worried about setting up the wireless access part but the process could not have been any easier. In fact, the ... directions to set everything up was so short and simple, I thought HP forgot to include the full directions. But I followed the steps and Bingo; the printer was online and was working.
The printer has a small footprint, is quiet and it prints fast and with very good quality. The scanner works well but is a little slow scanning at higher DPI.
I do have one instillation note I wish to pass on...
My system is a HP notebook, Windows 7 64-bit, AMD processor, ATI discreet graphics, 4 GB RAM and it is wirelessly connected to my DSL modem. Even though the printer will start to work after you follow the steps to set it up, I had to restart my notebook after all of the drivers and software was installed to get full functionality. The restart step was not covered in the directions and not suggested during the installation of the software. However, since completing the installation, the printer has always connected to the network and has never dropped the connection. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The printer setup instructions are outdated. I had to call HP Support to get new instructions. Once it was setup it has worked great. I love the ability to scan items and send them to any of the computers on the network with installed software. Also, that I can save scan has either images or pdf format. As a home printer, it is very good. I only wish it used the same cartridges as my other HP color printer.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The printer was very easy to set up with excellent directions. I am not the greastest techie in the world but I had no problem with it. The print quality is good and the price is great!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Nice printer but plastic pieces break
Item.Review: Ok so my son needed an all in one printer for his dorm room with a small footprint. After looking at this printer and the e-printing option, I thought this printer would do the job. Within minutes of installing the printer cartridges, I could tell the paper holder and tray guide were not going to hold up. After starting to close the paper tray panel, I heard a snap and one of the plastic hindges was breaking off. While this printer seemed to print well and was fairly inexpensive... I think you get what you pay for in quality. That is poor quality. Charge customers a few more dollars HP to get your design right and quality improved so things dont break right out of the box and I think you might have a winner. The footprint on this is great. Too bad it wont hold up.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: 3050a is a nice printer for the price. Easy network setup. ePrint makes printing boarding passes and email easy from my android phone--even when i am not home. Wish the printer duplexed

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I was skeptical about whether a low cost printer like this would be acceptable. It is fine. I just finished connecting this one to our church wireless network. No problems. Print quality good. Photo quality okay. Wireless connectivity awesome! The ePrint feature works great. I printed a decent picture from my phone. I recommend this printer if you just want a simple, low cost printer with good quality.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Price is right, ink is spendy!
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy to set up, great price, good print quality, wireless
Cons: Ink refill costs
Good printer at a reasonable price, set up is a breeze, I like the wireless feature and it works great. Refill ink price is a shocker! Ran out of black ink in about 3 weeks and the replacement ink combo pack for color and black and white (61X) costs more than the printer. Outrageous!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This Deskjet was very easy to set up. However, after a few days of use it quit working wirelessly do to some Technical problem? I contacted HP Technical support and they were relentless in solving the issue. Works with my desktop, laptop and iphone, wirelessly, flawlessly! For this reason, the superior service received, I will, and highly recommend HP products!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Air printing, ease of set up
Cons: Does not fax
Great little printer for the price. Set up,is super easy. Air printing is awesome and it is possible to print from remote locations via the hp website. No problems so far and no issues. Have not had long enough to know how much ink it sucks up.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: This product is just what I was looking for. It has been a tremendous help with my work and school. I am looking forward to buying more products from HP. Thank you for making it so much easier to deal with everyday life.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: I got it on sale, and it was easy to set it up for wireless.
Cons: Sometimes it takes a minute or two longer till it starts printing after receiving the message to print.
I really like my new HP printer. It was easy to get it set up with the wireless. I haven't had any problems with it. It works great. I really like HP printers. It replaces an old HP printer that I had for several years.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: It is very user friendly and easy to use.
This is a great printer//scanner/copier for home use. It was easy to install. It does all the basics and is very user friendly. I would recommend this to anyone who just needs a basic printer at home.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: A couple days after installing the software for this wireless printer my cpu was spiking and my mouse was popping an hour glass icon every 5 seconds. I thought I had a virus. The problem is when you turn the printer off, your laptop continues to scan for it and spawning a process call HPnetwork,,,,,(something). and does it every 5 seconds or so. The fix is on setup do not check (or uncheck) the scan option. Also go to your ink settings and uncheck check for ink level even when not printing. This is a big pain and should of been resolved by HP before shipping as they are well aware of the problem by now

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The reason that i purchased this printer so I can print from my Ipad. I needed a wireless printer and this fill my needs. It was simple to set up to print from my Ipad and laptop. I didn't have to do much for the Ipad and Laptop to connect to the printer. The only problem that I had was error message about the ink cartridge. I contacted HP service rep and together we solve the problem. All I had to do was shake the ink cartridge and reinstall in the printer. The printer work great and it does what i want it to do.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Fast Operation; Great Print Quality; Quiet; Easy To Set Up
For my uses, the printer is great. If I were engaged in a business, I'd probably want a heavier duty printer, with more features. For now, this one serves my purposes.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Cons: Top Loading Paper Tray
The scanner is the best scanner I have ever used, of many different brands I have owned. An excellent 3-1 printer, for a minimum cost.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: A compact unit with all the features I needed.
Item.Review: This is a nice compact unit with all the features I need for printing and copying. It was easy to assemble and worked perfectly the first time. I would recommend this printer to anyone who wants unit for home use.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Set up of the wireless connection was a bit of a task on the MAC but it finally worked after a few tries. 2nd one of these I bought. I'd buy another for the price.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Priced reasonable for all it does but let's see how much the ink refils costs.

Used www.hp.com to find download for DRIVER. Downloaded driver for this printer, and it now works fine. Guess I had an early version of Windows Vista.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Really it's a good printer for that price, really I enjoyed it. high resolution scanner, high resolution print .... I almost like the e-print issue it has wide range of use ,more easiness, more usefulness,, really like it ... I recommend it too for those who like to work in home & produce their own photo album, portrait ....

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: It will work for what I need.
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use; Reliable; Easy To Set Up

I don't do presentation quality materials, but for in office fliers, etc. it works fine. A little noisy, but no big deal. A little disappointed that the toner cartridges that came with it were so light. They ran out right away!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Was very pleased with the quality of printing.
Item.Review:
Pros: Ran a copy of our newest Grandson born on the fourth of July and the copy we printed was outstanding.
We couldnt have picked a better all in one wireless printer. Quality and clarity of documents and pictures is very pleasing. Ease of use is also great.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Print speed
Cons: Ink consumption
Although it does consume ink faster than I would like, it's a very good printer, and reasonably priced. The scanner works fine, and is a useful perk.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: The printer makes it very difficult to print on both sides of the page. It also is difficult to give a choice of color. It does gives this choice but it's too complicated. These are two features I had in my last Deskjet printer.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: You get what you pay for
Item.Review:
Pros: Small, decent print quality for documents, fast once it queues up and starts to print
Cons: Slow to get started printing when connected via wireless, scanning from the device is a bit cumbersome
I haven't purchased an HP in years, mostly because of my lack of appreciation for their software and how it used to overtake your system. Was a bit cumbersome to setup on wireless network that I have secured and running DD-WRT on my router. Once connected no issues but the intial setup was a bit time consuming.
Software is a bit better on this one but the delays to print can be unbearable sometimes, especially if you are in a rush to print fast. Tried scanning multiple documents today and if a scan is cancelled during the process you better plan a few minutes for it to ca ... tch up or just kill it via task manager and reboot.
Not sure I will purchase an HP again but could be just because this was the base model and you get what you pay for. Good quality printing documents, scanning is a bit cumbersome, and we haven't tried printing phots yet to see that print quality. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this printer last month. I just needed an easy to set up and use printer that was wireless, and would simply scan and print. It has so far worked flawlessly. It is not fast and seems to use a lot of ink, but it does what I need it to do......print. I'd recommend it for this. Good buy for what I paid.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this online last November and after it goes into "sleep" mode, when you send a document to be printed, I get an error code of "OXB032B15C". After restarting the printer and re sending the document, then it will print it. I noticed on the forums page there are alot of people having the same issue and HP has no explantion or fix, except to unplug and plug it back in, which does nothing at all. The error code doesn't show up on their trouble shooting page either.So what about it HP? Any fix planned for this software bug?

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Excellent Product for an Excellent Price
Item.Review: Wireless aligned itself with this printer. Coming from XP to windows 7 devices is truly a difference between night and day. Fast printer, quick to copy, and scan. Although scan has to be done from icon due to printer not recognizing if CD had been installed. This is the only thing that puzzled me. But you cannot beat the price.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Cons: Hard Setup; Wireless set up na; Noisy

The controls for the printer (buttons to push) are very difficult to use.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: excellent photos, can print from any location in the home
Cons: forget to change what tray to use
For the price, an excellent printer. I use it from the dining room where I have my laptop. Printing lots of photos of my new greatgranddaughter. Also can quickly print documents I've created from my word processing or email or online purchases. I forget sometimes to change what tray to use when printing documents. Ever seen a document printed on 5X7 photo paper .

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I needed to replace a Kodak Wireless printer which never performed as advertised and used excessive ink-very poor quality, blurred text, slow, etc. That said, i researched the web and decided, based on reviews and specifications, on the HP Deskjet 3050A since i have an HP Touchpad. I ordered the printer from HP Home and Office on Sunday and it was at my door on Tuesday when i got home from work! i unpacked it and it took me less than 30 minutes to set it up on 2 desk tops, 1 laptop and my HP Touchpad all on my home network-Att DSL. Wireless works flawlessly from all devices throughout the house. Followed HP installation guide and no problems were encountered while setting the printer up on the network and each of the devices. Even though it has been in use only a few days, completely satis ... fied and more than full fills my printing needs for a very economical price! expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: We were downsizing from an old (1998) HP OfficeJet All-in-One which worked wonderfully, but was not interfacing easily with Windows 7. We also wanted to downsize to a smaller printer-copier-scanner. POSITIVES: Excellent print/copy quality. So far, the scanner seems fine - it adequately picked up handwriting written with ink that wasn't very dark. NEGATIVES: The only feature that I'm unhappy about - I would prefer to set the print quality default at DRAFT, and that's not possible. REALLY MINOR ISSUE: I wish the paper tray could hold a bit more paper - this is definitely not a deal-breaker. All-in-all, I'm very happy with this printer for the price. i recommend it.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Hooked up real easy to both my computers. Also you get the USB cable with it. Other printers you have to purchase it separately. I'm very happy with my purchase. I read other reviews before I purchased and some said it was noisy but it really isn't that bad.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Printer (HP-3050A) arrived at my house in 3-days! I had it up and running in less than an hour! It does all the things as advertized extremely well and the ink is a whole lot less expensive! My old HP-7550 was till working when I purchased this new printer, however, it was getting very old and did not scan or copy. I am using the USB Cable until I get up enough nerve to venture into wireless-world! Great printer, price and ease of operation.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Just what I was looking for
Item.Review:
Pros: really good price
This printer is exactly what I was looking for - it prints, it scans, it copies, all wirelessly. It's not too big, and the copies are good quality. I was able to set it up all by myself, too, which I've never done before!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Price, easy to set up, easy to use, decent print quality, small size
Cons: Probably not good for professional use such as small business or photography
If you're looking to print the occasional email, document, web page, directions, etc wirelessly from your PC, Mac, iPad or mobile phone, this printer does the job well. It does just what you need quickly, without a glitch and good quality without any of the higher end features you'd rarely if ever need for casual use. It was very easy to set up (mine didn't require a firmware update), doesn't take much room and hasn't failed me yet. Do your homework, consider what you really need from a printer. If you don't need pro quality photo prints, high volume printing, fax or legal scan capability but simply want to get basic ink ... jet quality prints wirelessly from any device in the house, this printer is a tremendous value. Sure, they'll get you on the replacement cartridges but who doesn't and casual use means you won't be replacing cartridges very often anyway. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: Will not work with iPad's Airprint
Item.Review: I wanted a wireless printer so that I could print from either of our desktop computers and our laptop. I also wanted to print from our iPad using it's built-in utility AirPrint which this printer was advertised it would do. After an afternoon with HP tech support, IP tech support and Apple tech support I was told I should take the printer back which I did. I replaced it with an Epson NX 430 which worked perfectly in a matter of minutes.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I love this printer. It is a wonderful product for the money. Printing is extremely fast and the quality of the printing is as good as any I've seen. It takes up very little space, lightweight and is surprising a great replacement for my previously owned HP Officejet 6100 series. The printer was delivered within two days! Set up was a piece of cake. I had one question, which warranted a call to customer service. My issue was immediately resolved to my satisfaction. I will definitely order again from HP. Entire experience was A++++!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
I originally gave the HP Deskjet 3050A a poor review, as I had many problems with the ePrinter functionality. Well...that has all changed as Google has dramatically improved the Cloud Print System - plus HP has also greatly improved the ePrint system. Together, I can print perfectly from my Chromebook (Chrome OS) without the need of using another computer as a print server (Windows, Mac or Linux). I can print directly to the Deskjet 3050A using only my wireless Chromebook and wireless internet gateway. No drivers of any kind are needed!! It is fantastic.
In addition, I am able to use the copy function of the 3-in-1; however, because I am using the Chrome Operating System - I am unable to use the scanner. With the Chrome Operating System I cannot install external software to the soli ... d state drive - as it is a browser only operating system. This is a minor issue, as I have the use of a Windows 7 laptop for any scanning needs I may have.
In summary, the HP Deskjet 3050A is a very good printer - that works flawlessly with the Google Chrome Operating System. It's ePrint functionality is excellent. I would highly recommend this printer to anyone. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: Other than the fact that the wireless function has never worked, despite many attempts, this is a great machine for the price. It's fast, prints clearly, scans brilliantly, copies well. If you're looking for a reliable, basic machine (and don't need wireless printing), you'll be very happy with it -- very good value.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Easy To Use
Cons: Bloat Ware Software
I've used many different HP models over the years and prefer HP for quality and support.
But, as usual they include a lot of software on the CD that is not needed. If you run Windows 7 just plug the printer in and Windows will insatll it automatically and not include the junk that HP wants to run to sell you stuff. That is the reason for only 4 stars. I tried to custom install and choose basically the driver and it still started to run it all. So I recommend to just throw the CD away and let Windows 7 install just the drivers.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I have purchased two (2) HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One. I was so pleased with the one I purchased for my home office, I purchased one for my wife's business. The wireless and networking functions work great. Black Ink use seems a little high, but again I print a lot of contracts and other legal documents. The scanner works - really works - and this is the first one out of 2 other all-in-one printers that delivers in scanner performance. This is a really good printer for home office use.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Simple, and it works as promised. Cheap enough to buy 2!
Cons: Scanning is not precise
The "HP DeskJet Network-Ready Wireless Color e-All-In-One Printer (Model: CR232A#B1H | SKU: 2573177)" does not have a catchy name but is a great little printer/copier/fax/etc. operation. It is a basic machine with some modern updates.
Most “all in one” models fail to excel and anything and sometimes fail to deliver on at least one promised function. This HP model is easy to install, takes MUCH less space that the competitive offerings and prints and copies quickly and cleanly. It's not the greatest scanner but that should not be the primary reason to select this printer.
If you need to print online receipts, coupons, homework, or general household or home office jobs, th ... is printer is highly capable and SIMPLE. It may be too lightweight for a busy office but it's ideal for home use, and SIMPLE! It also works wirelessly, something that our more expensive Canon printer could never seem to resolve.
Overall, we are very happy with this easy-to-use printer and recommend it for reasons stated. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I bought this in a rush because my not so old HP PSC2530 all-in-one was not compatible with the Windows 7 OS on my newly delivered HP desktop. Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I am so pleased with this printer. It does all that is advertised and more. Installations was simple and easy. I have owned 5 hp printers and for the price this is by far the best. I needed my printer for next day delivery. It got here right at 2:00 PM.

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I use an Acer AC700 Google Chromebook, and as such, the HP ePrint functionality appealed a great deal to me. I have used the Google Cloud Print service ever since I started using a Chromebook, which thankfully works perfect. I recently bought the Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One...and connected the new printer to the ePrint network, and soon found out that the printer was built very well; however, the HP ePrint network connection was continually down - and caused numerous print jobs to crash. I've gotten so frustrated with the ePrint system that I completely turned off the ePrint functionality on the printer - and am now only using it as a wireless printer through the Google Cloud Print system. The hardware for the Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One is actually fine, but the ePrint system is much too bu ... ggy and slow for me to use. This is a major disappointment for me, as I would have spent my money on a different printer if I had know this in advance. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review:
Pros: Wireless Printing
I got this printer for $30 with a purchase of a laptop, and it was well worth It. Its most notable feature is the Wireless Printing and the Anywhere Printing. The wireless printing saves space as in there are less cables and things lying all over the place, so thats a plus. It also has Anywhere printing, I am not sure if thats the right name for it, but basically, you can print anything from anywhere to where ever the printer is hooked up, but there has to be Wi-Fi for it to work, because thats how the printer connects to the internet. You basically set up an HP account and create an email address for which to send print jobs. This printer is valued at around $80 or something, so I suggest if you want it cheaper you look for deals, its the only reason i got i ... t. But it is great. Oh, by the way, multiple computers can hook up the the printer's wireless printing network. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: My dad just bought me this printer. I always buy HP products in everything. I have a wireless laptop, and I needed a wireless printer to go with it. Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.Review: I needed to replace a 10 year old hp scanner, which i loved, so i picked this model because it was wireless and could also print from my new iPad. My non techie husband installed this printer by following the poster included and had no problems. Once set up, the iPad magically detected it and easily printed something I was working on in Pages. The scanner is easy to use. I control it from a control pad on the unit itself, unlike my old scanner that had to be installed on my pc to use. This scanner automatically scans items into my documents folder, so they are very easy to find. The eprint feature is great though i don't know how much I will need it. But it is convenient for my husband, who can print work things from his blackberry since he has no access to work stuff from home. I also lik ... e that the color ink is just one cartridge. More economical. I don't need to print photos from home. I don't need the fax feature since I can just have stuff emailed to me and print that out instead. Overall, I am very happy with the ease of use and competitive pricing of this all-in-one. expand » « collapse

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States

The first thing I did was to print a color page and was astonished at how beautiful it printed; and fast to boot. I am able to eprint and print from my mobile phone. I surely got my money's worth and would highly recommend it. It is a true value. Go HP!

Item.Item: HP Deskjet 3050A e-All-in-One J611g Color Ink-jet - Printer / copier / scanner - English, French, Spanish / Canada, United States
Item.ReviewTitle: I would by this product again
Item.Review:
Pros: Great Print Quality; Easy To Use; Easy To Set Up; Compact Design; Fast Operation; Reliable
Whether you need to print Word documents or photos, copy or scan, this printer is excellent at a bargain price. It is compact and fits on my desk with the laptop, but don't think because it is small that it lacks quality. It works as well as any high-end printer on the market.
